role_inference_description.template:
Based on a provided setting description, infere two roles involved in the conversation in the provided setting. Assign a more moderatory role to GPT and the other to user. Format the output as: 
"setting": "SETTING" 
"roles": ["ROLE1", "ROLE2"] 
"GPT_role": "ROLE" 
"user_role": "ROLE"

choices:
setting: A conversation in a cafe in english.
roles: [waiter, customer]
GPT_role: waiter
user_role: customer

setting: A conversation in a library in german.
roles:  [student, librarian]
GPT_role: librarian
user_role: student

setting: A conversation with a friend in swedish.
persons: [friend, me]
GPT_role: friend
user_role: me

setting: A conversation in a police station.
persons:  [Policeman, me]
GPT_role: Policeman
user_role: me
